Trade/Device Name(s): BBL Sensi-Disc Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test Disks, Telithromycin 15μg
Telithromycin 15μg BBL Sensi-Disc Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test Disks
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BBL Sensi-Disc Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test Disks impregnated with Telithromycin 15μg for in vitro determination of bacterial susceptibility.
Indications for Use Summary: Used for in vitro agar diffusion testing to determine bacterial susceptibility to telithromycin; shown active in vitro against Staphylococcus aureus (methicillin and erythromycin susceptible isolates), Streptococcus pneumoniae (including multidrug resistant), Haemophilus influenzae, Streptococcus pyogenes (erythromycin susceptible), Streptococci (Lancefield groups C and G), and Viridans group streptococci.
